column1: L, 'Fire Her!' Fox News Fans Melt Down After Host Criticizes Maskless Spring Breakers, David, 03-21-21,
column2: Fox News host Arthel Neville faced criticism from viewers on Sunday after she suggested that vacationers on spring break have "too many freedoms" if they refuse to wear a mask.
column3: During a live report from Miami one Florida correspondent told Neville that very few visitors were wearing masks.
column4: Because it's not required Neville observed. "That's the point... You know people don't follow the rules if they're given too many freedoms."
column5: That remark prompted dozens of tweets from upset Fox News viewers.
column6: Did those words really just fall out of your mouth? one viewer asked. "Lady you get worse and worse and worse."
column7: So you want to LIMIT OUR FREEDOMS????? another complained.
column8: Fire this idiot will you please one person demanded.
